Name: Healing Wish
Effect: Target Self. The User Faints. One Allied Target restores its full HP and it is cured from any Status Condition, if it was Fainted, restore its conciousness. If the chosen Target is not in-battle, it is called out and ready to fight with the same remaining actions as the User.
Description: In a display of true selflessness, the user makes the ultimate sacrifice for the well-being of others.
